column4: Great video by Dayton company @realart on the importance of staying safe in #COVID19. https://t.co/clSx86nhwo

This morning I visited Trifecta Tool & Engineering in Kettering. Amidst the #COVID pandemic, Trifecta has used their manufacturing operations to start producing #PPE materials, such as protective visor parts. Thank you to the Trifecta Team for keeping us safe. https://t.co/W0sxSmY8NL
All of #OH10 is currently considered high incidence. Please continue to wear your masks, social distance, and wash your hands. https://t.co/OvTOCN01f9

If you live in Montgomery County & need assistance due to  #COVID19, be sure to apply for it by the following deadlines:

Oct 30:
Mortgage Assistance
Nonprofit
#SmallBiz
Education
Agriculture
Childcare
Healthcare

Nov 13:
Rental Assistance
DP&L/Vectren

https://t.co/QLPe9c9nfN https://t.co/lWJc3t4iaQ

Delphi Salaried Retirees lost their health care & their pensions under the Obama-Biden Administration.

Yesterday @POTUS gave the Delphi Salaried Retirees hope for the first time in 11 years. Watch via @dayton247now's @Bryn247NOW: https://t.co/oLJrhHZIyw

Today I took another step to support and assist #SmallBiz in our community during #COVID19. PPP loans provided to date over $820 million across 7,300 small businesses in #OH10. It is imperative the House votes on an extension of the PPP program. https://t.co/9UVqeLegP4
RT @PublicHealthDMC: Public Health will be providing free walk-up COVID-19 testing at Bethesda Temple  tomorrow from 12PM to 5PM. No appoin…

Yesterday I joined @RepAGonzalez in asking @POTUS to give at least 5M #COVID19 tests to #OH to help us continue to respond to the pandemic. Read more here: https://t.co/7Yfx0utlKQ https://t.co/Xz1GlqgvEi

I would like to congratulate @DCDCLive CEO Ro Nita Hawes-Saunders for being the first ever recipient of the DBJ Jane Haley Award for Determination, Perseverance and Achievement. Ms. Hawes-Saunder’s efforts have made Dayton a better place, and she is most deserving of this award.

Congrats to @cityofdayton & @BeavercreekOHCH on being ranked #33 in the country for operating a startup. As I said last week, @WrightPattAFB's 10K+ job growth since I have been in Congress has helped insulate #OH10's economy from what could have been greater job loss in #COVID19. https://t.co/iH1mmD2MDg
RT @RiponAdvance: Ohio's @RepMikeTurner helped secure $165 million in COVID-19 relief funds that will be distributed to five children's hos…

.@WrightPattAFB's growth of over 10K jobs since I have been in Congress has helped insulate #OH10's economy from what could have been much greater job loss during #COVID19. Read more via @DBJnews: https://t.co/syqXuFcuYh
RT @PremierHealthOH: Premier Health and CompuNet Clinical Laboratories on 8/24 will open multiple COVID-19 specimen collection sites throug…
I will continue to advocate for @DaytonChildrens & our community as we navigate this ongoing pandemic. Read more here: https://t.co/Oh9nrF47wR

After my communications with the Administration in support of additional funding for children’s hospitals, I am proud to announce that #OH will be receiving $165M in #COVID19 relief funds for children’s hospitals.
When I visited @DaytonChildrens last week & met with CEO Deb Feldman, it was clear how much work their team has put into combating #COVID19 & keeping their patients healthy. https://t.co/rLx6HXiqjZ
RT @PublicHealthDMC: Public Health will be hosting another day of free COVID-19 testing for the community, on Tuesday, August 18 from 12:00…

It is important that the Postmaster General & @USPS respond to the challenges caused by #COVID19 in order to protect our right to vote. That is why I am urging USPS to prepare for the increased amount of mail in ballots that will likely be sent this election season.

On Friday, I wrote to the Postmaster General requesting @USPS coordinate with the State of Ohio to prepare for an increase of absentee & mail-in ballots resulting from #COVID19. Voting is a cornerstone of democracy.

@GDRTA provides a critical service to the Dayton area. They have adapted to the uncertainty of the pandemic by ramping up nightly bus sanitation and developing touch-free access that begins next month. I was proud to join them today to view their new eco-smart fleet. https://t.co/P7kiEz45pi

This morning I visited @DaytonChildrens and met with President and CEO Deb Feldman. The hospital and its employees have put in tremendous work to make Dayton Children’s Hospital a major #COVID19 testing site for the state of Ohio. https://t.co/iMCwmIa978

Year after year, far leftist liberal progressives attempt to cut the defense spending budget. This year they have begun to deceptively use #COVID19 as an excuse to slash spending for our national security. Read my opinion in @thehill: https://t.co/xfzflYfNnn
.@PublicHealthDMC is providing free #COVID19 testing at the Montgomery County Fairgrounds today until 4pm. More info here: https://t.co/YyrWom7Vp5

I am glad @DeptVetAffairs has decided to extend this much-needed financial relief through the end of the year for veterans & their families so they can focus on their health and wellbeing during the coronavirus pandemic. Learn more here⬇️ https://t.co/QZvgDhlDN8

PVS Plastics is an important contributor to combatting #COVID19. I am grateful for PVS & its employees, who continue develop ventilator technology & other important medical equipment. Read more via @daytondailynews: https://t.co/gJHeZ33I2H

I am proud to announce I secured $58.5M in funding for construction projects @ @WrightPattAFB in #FY21NDAA. Between these projects & the $182M expansion @ NASIC I secured, WPAFB has gained $240M+ from my direct advocacy & work on HASC in the past 3 years. https://t.co/W1CDC1nK0h
Read my op-ed in @DailySignal about why cutting defense spending as a response to #COVID19 is neither a safe nor suitable solution: https://t.co/39Pg8H5XGc

RT @FiveRiversHC: TODAY IN MONTGOMERY COUNTY!!!
FREE COVID tests for our community, in partnership with the State of Ohio.

No appointment…

Today @RepTimRyan​ & I led a letter to @POTUS urging him to restore the pension plans of Delphi Salaried Retirees before any further #COVID19 relief for the auto industry is distributed. Read more here: https://t.co/jtrt8qXELY

The economic impact of the #COVID19 pandemic on 1890s such as @CentralState87 has been devastating. I look forward to @SecretarySonny & @USDA working to provide funding to these critical universities as quickly as possible. https://t.co/FOVPayvH7E
Awesome flyby by @180thFW over Dayton today. Thank you to everyone fighting #COVID19 on the frontlines #SaluteOhio https://t.co/Dw5B4oJkhp

I joined @RepBobGibbs, @RepMarcyKaptur, & 86 of our colleagues in supporting future federal legislation addressing #COVID19 to forgive Medicare accelerated payments’ interest rates & pursue full loan forgiveness for hospitals & other providers. Read more: https://t.co/VWVSGQVEYf

This week I am introducing the Employer & Employee #COVID Protection Act to eliminate barriers to reopening businesses, get Americans back to work, & empower employees to decide for themselves if they feel safe in their workplace. Read more here: https://t.co/82qdYREf86

RT @RepEscobar: Servicemembers and their families deserve access to the safest care during this #COVID19 pandemic.

That’s why I led a bipa…

The grants provided to @GDRTA will allow our community to stay connected to these essential services & help local transit get through the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic. I will continue to support funding for our necessary local infrastructure.

.@GDRTA is set to receive $75M from @FTA_DOT as a result of #CARESact, which I supported. RTA provides access to essential services such as grocery stores, healthcare facilities, & other businesses critical to daily life.

These grants increase funding to help protect our community’s most vulnerable, as well as support healthcare workers on the frontlines of the battle against coronavirus. I will continue to advocate for funding for our local healthcare facilities as we combat this pandemic.
.@FiveRiversHC & Community Health Centers of Greater Dayton are receiving a combined $1.7M in #COVID19 relief grants from @HHSGov thanks to #CARESact. https://t.co/MMngVr6DhB

Today I led several of my #OH colleagues in requesting the @DeptofDefense to provide guidance to the defense industrial base, specifically those supporting the @AFResearchLab at @WrightPattAFB during the #COVID19 pandemic. Full letter here: https://t.co/xOXtQABYhZ

Today I spoke with Michelle Riley, CEO of @foodbankinc. @OHNationalGuard is currently deployed helping the foodbank & I personally just made a donation. For more info on foodbank locations and drop-offs during #COVID19, visit https://t.co/vLirTiY8sO https://t.co/CpQNLRG2ih
My District Director participated on a call with @PremierHealthOH today for an update on coronavirus. For more information on their resources and #COVID19 testing, visit https://t.co/wi1DO1CheQ
I’ve spoken with @DaytonUnitNAACP President Derrick Foward. Their website is a great resource for more information on coronavirus: https://t.co/rwzpyCQDAO

I’ve spoken to Mark Murdock, Director of Dayton VA Medical Center, regarding coronavirus. For more information and resources for veterans, please visit https://t.co/NHw1szf7Ds @DeptVetAffairs @VeteransHealth

https://t.co/aChw9T5vkQ via #VAntagePoint
Today I spoke to @daytonregion President & CEO @Hoag8 regarding DDC’s response to coronavirus. For more information, visit https://t.co/BDbhYQqxGm

.@PremierHealthOH is doing drive up coronavirus testing in the @univofdayton arena parking lot until 6pm. You must come with a doctor’s order to be tested. More details here: https://t.co/zcuARUbIBW
I just spoke with @nanwhaley about @cityofdayton’s coronavirus response efforts. You can learn more about Dayton’s COVID-19 resources by visiting https://t.co/oZ8mNYf6qF

Just spoke with @MCOhio Commissioner Lieberman about Montgomery County’s coronavirus resources. For more info, follow Montgomery County at @PublicHealthDMC, call the hotline at 937-225-6217, and visit https://t.co/sPysjVa5uI
This morning I was on a conference call with @GovMikeDeWine & the Ohio Congressional Delegation discussing emergency legislation by Congress & the Governor's actions to combat coronavirus.
For coronavirus resources, please visit https://t.co/D3VAmmsHVU

I successfully advocated for a year long extension of the Health Care Coverage Tax Credit, which many Delphi Salaried Retirees rely on to afford health care, to be included in the appropriations package that passed the House yesterday. Learn more here: https://t.co/EXNLcZiFu1

I am proud to be the Republican lead on this bill to take reasonable steps towards improving the way we report domestic violence, criminal history, and mental health cases to protect our citizens and save lives. https://t.co/LnmJvb3RYi

Today I reintroduced #TREATact to expand access to treatment and increase flexibility in how existing federal funding can be used to combat the #OpioidEpidemic. Learn more here: https://t.co/mMJMTkXpXZ

Hospitals are reimbursed an average of only 87¢ of every $1 they spend caring for Medicare patients. #MedicareForAll would inevitably result in hospital closures & decrease patients' access to lifesaving health care. It is not a solution to Democrats' broken Obamacare system. https://t.co/OYmzx8uwlp
Today I introduced The Health Coverage Tax Credit Reauthorization Act to protect @DelphiRetirees' health care. Learn more here: https://t.co/Gx6kndOaH7
Yesterday I was honored to speak at several #MLKday events in #OH10, including at @KetteringHealth and Dayton’s MLK rally and banquet. https://t.co/gqGUbkBeAf
My full interview with @CNN's @KateBolduan about #NorthKorea's latest test and why a list of its nuclear weapons and testing sites is necessary to verify denuclearization: https://t.co/HvKzoWR9uq

Talking to Greene County Medical Society tonight about the importance of their advocacy. Today, 2 of my bills to combat #OpioidEpidemic became law: #CRIBact and #MedicaidReentryAct. These bills came as a direct result from members of our community expressing their needs. https://t.co/wMfpz5PlhX

#ICYMI: last week, #CRIBact passed the Senate. Facilities like @BrigidsPath in #OH10 will directly benefit to continue to help the most vulnerable victims of the #OpioidEpidemic: babies born exposed to opioids.

#WATCH via @whiotv: https://t.co/9uDnyR2aMY

As we continue to combat the #OpioidEpidemic, I joined @RepAnnieKuster yesterday in leading a bipartisan letter to urge increased funding for substance abuse treatment for incarcerated individuals. #READ: https://t.co/3ua24QhWka
My #CRIBact & #MedicaidReentryAct were included in today's bill to combat the #OpioidEpidemic. Learn more here: https://t.co/3fJPc4BExd https://t.co/jpW8PIcvEl

Kicking off @HUDDepSec’s visit to #OH10 today by hosting a community roundtable with local housing, law enforcement, and health officials to discuss our efforts to combat the #OpioidEpidemic. https://t.co/JEhdGL9xWX

Today I met with advocates from #OH10's @DaytonChildrens to talk about the medical needs of foster care children and my continued support for the Children's Health Insurance Program #CHIP. https://t.co/fq2PKps5Ud

I'm calling on @HHSGov to release the study on PFAS. The release of this study is a public health and safety issue for every community with a military installation in it, including mine.

#READ my letter here: https://t.co/sp6TbIgip4 https://t.co/QyQE1BqN29

Today’s advancement of #MedicaidReentryAct through @HouseCommerce is a huge step towards getting addicted and incarcerated individuals access to the substance abuse treatment they need.

#READ more about my bill addressing #OpioidEpidemic w/ @RepPaulTonko: https://t.co/xcKo86aqA1 https://t.co/ifXCa1YufD

This is not an issue of public relations--this is an issue of public health and safety. #READ my letter to @EPA calling for the public release of a water contamination study: https://t.co/0Qxa9kCe6S https://t.co/mVHSMJ0mDG

2 of my bills to fight #OpioidEpidemic advanced this week
➡ #SHIELDSact to close a @DeptofDefense prescription reporting gap was included in #FY19NDAA
➡ #MedicaidReentryAct increasing access to substance abuse treatment went through @HouseCommerce #SubHealth

#WATCH via @whiotv https://t.co/5vyU3fjUu0
Yesterday I joined @RepPaulTonko's Medicaid Reentry Act as the lead Republican cosponsor to combat the #OpioidEpidemic. #READ more about the bill: https://t.co/ZVvf7Lx8ab https://t.co/vrIBgeJcTg
This morning I spoke at @daytonregion’s annual DC fly-in about #OpioidEpidemic, @WrightPattAFB, & combatting Russian aggression. https://t.co/dgXrIIDr8C

This week I talked with @WDTN about the opioid epidemic, North Korea, China, and funding for @WrightPattAFB. 

#WATCH my full interview: https://t.co/6h1Sbg4xEi

Last week I updated @GreeneCountyOH Commissioners on what Congress is doing to combat #OpioidEpidemic and provide housing for youths.

#READ more via @fairbornherald: https://t.co/MOeE2bNQHu

Today I provided a congressional update to @GreeneCountyOH Board of Commissioners, specifically combatting #OpioidEpidemic, funding @WrightPattAFB, and maintaining safe drinking water in #OH10. https://t.co/U9jQ7REFOd

Last night I joined Washington Court House’s city council meeting to give an update on how I’m working to combat #OpioidEpidemic, including #TREATact and #CRIBact. For more info on my bills, visit https://t.co/zL7h5cUOfY. #OH10 https://t.co/cKZbJOuPM2
RT @MainStreetGOP: 2 important pieces of legislation that need to be a part of a comprehensive approach to addressing the #OpioidEpidemic -…
This morning, I joined @ABC22FOX45 to discuss #OpioidEpidemic and @HHSGov Secretary Azar's visit to @BrigidsPath in #OH10. https://t.co/WkxKOnTd3S

Today’s #AmericanBudget is a good starting point for funding American priorities in the coming year. #READ my full statement on how it combats #OpioidEpidemic, rebuilds #readiness, & bolsters @WrightPattAFB: https://t.co/kTI7RLtsEJ

The inclusion of #TREATact in the Bipartisan Heroin Task Force’s Legislative Agenda is a huge step forward in addressing #OpioidEpidemic.

#READ: https://t.co/rpbPl5mN2h https://t.co/jUzDUP5gzy
I signed a letter with @RepDaveJoyce & @RepTimRyan asking @MickMulvaneyOMB to provide a funding plan to address the #OpioidCrisis public health emergency. https://t.co/BrUi3gUiFs

A @DeptofDefense reporting loophole makes our nation’s active duty service members, reservists, their families, veterans, & retirees vulnerable to the #OpioidEpidemic. 

#READ my letter with @sethmoulton to #SecDef about why this needs fixed: https://t.co/5y00IlMwM1 https://t.co/5Tqaf7132e
I joined @MSNBC Live with @AlexWitt yesterday morning to discuss Iran and health care. #WATCH the full interview: https://t.co/5eIFUJGtbJ
I’m on @MSNBC Live with @AlexWitt to talk about Iran and health care. Tune in!
Clearly, what we’ve done to fight #OpioidEpidemic in #OH10 has not been enough. #READ via @daytondailynews: https://t.co/EZuBLr8egt
Great to see @OhioHeadStart in DC today to talk about solutions to the #OpioidEpidemic. https://t.co/wVevXKlO12

#OH10 needs to coordinate its effort to combat the #OpioidEpidemic through a drug czar. 
#READ via @daytondailynews: https://t.co/FSujQSnfDf
#OH10 leaders and I met this morning to discuss how to prevent the spread of the #OpioidEpidemic. https://t.co/FuQxoYH2O3
.@RepSteveStivers & I visited Alkermes to learn about its medical approach to combating the #OpioidEpidemic. #READ: https://t.co/b1dRvCrHls https://t.co/7DyRMD8jmf
Thx again @PremierHealth 4 easing pain of babies born addicted to #opiates. #READ abt my recess visit via @rollcall: https://t.co/utaBtIb32v https://t.co/yvn9ivXAz4
